name: Hog Post
description:
Ride the boar and deliver mail to da boss!

You need to deliver important message to your boss.
You boar loses energy when run to long or when hit tree.
Feed them with orc's and ride again

Controls:

  • arrows or WASD to cotroll the boar and the player's goblin
  • left mouse for attack
  • SPACE to dash
  • E for grab orc and feed the boar
